name: .SFI File Extension
summary: Learn about .SFI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An SFI file is an encrypted file created by SafeFolder, an application used to encrypt sensitive files. It contains a file secured with the SFI encryption format, which includes digital rights management (DRM) and identity management functionality.

content: To secure your confidential files with SFI encryption, simply drag and drop them onto the SafeFolder app.
NOTE: As of 2016, SafeSuite.com is no longer developed or maintained.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
